definitions.title: n.pr.m.
definitions.body: a son of Levi, and head of a chief Levit. family: LXX Merar(e)I, Mararei;—Ge 46:11, Ex 6:16, Ex 6:19, Nu 3:17, Nu 3:20, Nu 3:33, Nu 3:33, Nu 3:35, Nu 3:36, Nu 4:29, Nu 4:33, Nu 4:42, Nu 4:45, Nu 7:8, Nu 10:17, Nu 26:57, Jos 21:7, Jos 21:34, Jos 21:38 (all P), 1Ch 5:27, 1Ch 6:1, 1Ch 6:4, 1Ch 6:14, 1Ch 6:29, 1Ch 6:32, 1Ch 6:48, 1Ch 6:62, 1Ch 9:14, 1Ch 15:6, 1Ch 15:17, 1Ch 23:6, 1Ch 23:21, 1Ch 24:26, 1Ch 24:27, 1Ch 26:10, 1Ch 26:19, 2Ch 29:12, 2Ch 34:12, Ezr 8:19.
